txt.en: 'Get up, get up! I hear someone coming.'
'But why are we here guarding that Elf?'
'If anything gets up these stairs, Morven will have your hides.'
Laerdan is being held captive in Sammath Baul.
'Stop them! The Elf must not escape!'
'Keep messing with those bodies, and Morven will have you up for questioning!'
'You will be tortured until you tell me all that you know!'
Laerdan is nearly unconscious and wounded.  He must be taken to Rivendell to Elrond for you doubt that he will survive without his aid.
Enter Sammath Baul and find Laerdan.
'It seems you have bested my guards, but that is of little consequence.'
'Were you sent here for the Elf?'
'It matters not. You will tell me all that you know before I deliver you to Amarthiel!'
'Do you think you can best me? We shall see!'
